latex:
The addition below is incorrect. What is the largest digit that can be changed to make the addition correct?\\
\[
\begin{array}{cccc}
& 6 & 4 & 1 \\
& 8 & 5 & 2 \\
+ & 9 & 7 & 3 \\ \hline
2 & 4 & 5 & 6
\end{array}
\]\\
\\
$\textbf{(A)}\ 4 \qquad \textbf{(B)}\ 5 \qquad \textbf{(C)}\ 6 \qquad \textbf{(D)}\ 7 \qquad \textbf{(E)}\ 8$
